about.part1: Hello! I am Megumi Kawagoe based in Amsterdam, Netherlands.
about.part2: I'm a passionate Frontend developer, born and brought up in Japan.
about.part3: 2021年に<1>まなびと</1>でHTMLとCSS、jQuery, WordPressからコーディングの勉強を始めました。
about.part4: Through learning jQuery, I was eager to learn from fundamental to a wide range of JavaScript.
about.part5: Then I decided to move into Europe and joined <2>Ironhack</2> Fullstack Web Development Bootcamp in 2021.
about.part6: Since my developer career started, I’ve been obsessed with styling and JavaScript and JS frameworks, and passionate organising the code structures and problem solving.
about.part7: I’ve lived in different countries and worked at different types of companies and I enjoyed developing social, technical skills and communicating.My time abroad has taught me to be a true team player and adaptive with those who have different backgrounds.
about.part8: Talking about personality, I love traveling, learning new languages, playing sports and doing handicraft.
about.part9: Interestingly, my first solo trip was when I was 11 years old to join a summer school in Australia. Since then I have traveled to more than 20 countries.
